verses.text: When \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w trembling|strong="H7578"\w*, he \w exalted|strong="H5375"\w* himself in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; but when he \w offended|strong="H0816"\w* in \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

And now they \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* more and \w more|strong="H3254"\w*, and have \w made|strong="H6213"\w* them molten \w images|strong="H4541"\w* of their \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \add and\add* \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* according to their own \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*, all of it the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w craftsmen|strong="H2796"\w*: they \w say|strong="H0559"\w* of them, Let the \w men|strong="H0120"\w* that \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w kiss|strong="H5401"\w* the \w calves|strong="H5695"\w*.\f + \fr 13.2 \ft they sin…: Heb. they add to sin\f*\f + \fr 13.2 \ft the men…: or, the sacrificers of men\f*

Therefore they shall be as the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, and as the \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* that passeth \w away|strong="H1980"\w*, as the \w chaff|strong="H4671"\w* \add that\add* is driven with the \w whirlwind|strong="H5590"\w* out of the \w floor|strong="H1637"\w*, and as the \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* out of the \w chimney|strong="H0699"\w*.

Yet I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* no \w god|strong="H0430"\w* but \w me|strong="H2108"\w*: for \add there is\add* no \w saviour|strong="H3467"\w* beside \w me|strong="H1115"\w*.
¶ I did \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thee in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of great \w drought|strong="H8514"\w*.\f + \fr 13.5 \ft great…: Heb. droughts\f*

According to their \w pasture|strong="H4830"\w*, so were they \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*; they were \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*, and their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* was \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*; therefore have they \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* me.
Therefore I will be unto them as a \w lion|strong="H7826"\w*: as a \w leopard|strong="H5246"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* will I \w observe|strong="H7789"\w* \add them:\add*

I will \w meet|strong="H6298"\w* them as a \w bear|strong="H1677"\w* \add that is\add* \w bereaved|strong="H7909"\w* \add of her whelps\add*, and will \w rend|strong="H7167"\w* the \w caul|strong="H5458"\w* of their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and there will I \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* them like a \w lion|strong="H3833"\w*: the \w wild|strong="H7704"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* shall \w tear|strong="H1234"\w* them.\f + \fr 13.8 \ft wild…: Heb. beast of the field\f*
¶ O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, thou hast \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* thyself; but in me \add is\add* thine \w help|strong="H5828"\w*.\f + \fr 13.9 \ft is…: Heb. in thy help\f*

I \w will|strong="H0165"\w* be thy \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w where|strong="H0645"\w* \add is any other\add* that may \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thee in all thy \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*? and thy \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* of whom thou \w saidst|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* me a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*?\f + \fr 13.10 \ft I will…: rather, Where is thy king?\f*
I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \add him\add* away in my \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*.
The \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \add is\add* bound \w up|strong="H6887"\w*; his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \add is\add* \w hid|strong="H6845"\w*.

The \w sorrows|strong="H2256"\w* of a travailing \w woman|strong="H3205"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon him: he \add is\add* an \w unwise|strong="H2450"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*; for he should not \w stay|strong="H5975"\w* \w long|strong="H6256"\w* in \add the place of\add* the breaking \w forth|strong="H4866"\w* of \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 13.13 \ft long: Heb. a time\f*

I will \w ransom|strong="H6299"\w* them from the \w power|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w*; I will \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* them from \w death|strong="H4194"\w*: O \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, I \w will|strong="H0165"\w* be thy \w plagues|strong="H1698"\w*; O \w grave|strong="H7585"\w*, I \w will|strong="H0165"\w* be thy \w destruction|strong="H6987"\w*: \w repentance|strong="H5164"\w* shall be \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* from mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 13.14 \ft power: Heb. hand\f*

¶ Though he be \w fruitful|strong="H6500"\w* among \add his\add* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, an east \w wind|strong="H6921"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and his \w spring|strong="H4726"\w* shall become \w dry|strong="H0954"\w*, and his \w fountain|strong="H4599"\w* shall be dried \w up|strong="H2717"\w*: he shall \w spoil|strong="H8154"\w* the \w treasure|strong="H0214"\w* of all \w pleasant|strong="H2532"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*.\f + \fr 13.15 \ft pleasant…: Heb. vessels of desire\f*

\w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* shall become \w desolate|strong="H0816"\w*; for she hath \w rebelled|strong="H4784"\w* against her \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: they shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: their \w infants|strong="H5768"\w* shall be dashed in \w pieces|strong="H7376"\w*, and their women with \w child|strong="H2030"\w* shall be ripped \w up|strong="H1234"\w*.
